name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Technical Engineer with 13+ years of experience in server administration and troubleshooting across diverse environments, including **Linux** and **Windows**. Proficient in **Shell**, **Bash**, and SQL to monitor system performance, resolve issues, and ensure high availability. Demonstrated ability to provide exceptional customer support and create comprehensive documentation.

Additionally, a Full Stack Developer with expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Hands-on experience in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Skilled in building AI/ML-powered platforms with a focus on predictive analytics and real-time processing, deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines. Well-versed in compliance-driven development aligned with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, with a strong background in MLOps using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
